topic.title: Default ZeroTalk to your language / Remove the Default to English
topic.body: There are so many Chinese posts and comments in the English board. Some of us think this is because the board defaults to English, regardless of your language settings. It would be nice that it defaults to the board of your language, or at the very least requires the user to choose their language first, rather than just landing them on the English page.
